content.question: Which of the following policy changes will most likely shift the long-run aggregate supply curve to the right?

choices.label: An increase in the money supply
An increase in the required reserve ratio
An increase in the government budget deficit financed by borrowing
An increase in government spending on public education

content.answer: An increase in government spending on public education

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
